channel.title: Comments on: End Of My Offline Experiment
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) I was avoiding everyone, but it didn't feel much different
item.content:encoded: :) I was avoiding everyone, but it didn’t feel much different

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
And all this time I was thinking that you were blocking me since you don't want to help with technical questions.
[btw, your experiment was not made under stp]
item.content:encoded:
And all this time I was thinking that you were blocking me since you don’t want to help with technical questions.

[btw, your experiment was not made under stp]
